txt.en: Deadly Easterling Horsemen patrol the plains outside of their large encampment of Jóshkhin Orda, north of North-torr.

'I find it cruel that the Easterlings train to use our own good horses against us! Are they trying to even the odds in open field warfare against the Rohirrim?\n\n'Well, they cannot make up for generations of experience, nor the appreciation that we have for horses, nor the skills of a Rohirrim rider. You taught them a lesson today. Even a new recruit to horse-back warfare such as yourself was able to best them!'
Deadly Easterling Horsemen patrol the plains outside of their large encampment of Jóshkhin Orda, north of North-torr.

Mounted Easterlings train on their newly acquired horses outside their large encampment of Jóshkhin Orda to the north of North-torr.\n\nYou should defeat the Easterling Horsemen, for they are powerful and dangerous foes.
Return to Guthferth, Sergeant of North-torr

Sergeant Guthferth rallies the defences of North-torr just north of Floodwend, attempting to hold back the flood of Easterlings threatening to drown the Wold in chaos.\n\nYou should speak with Sergeant Guthferth.
